about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in planetary conflict, where strategy and tactics are paramount. Engage in single missions or a comprehensive campaign, and lead over 20 unique air and ground units into combined arms warfare. Play solo or team up with up to 4 friends in co-op mode to wage destruction together.

Dynamic Destructible Environments:

One of the standout features of Crimson Incursion is its dynamic destructible environments. Engage in battles where every building, every piece of cover, and every inch of the battlefield can be destroyed. Use the destruction mechanics to your advantage, opening up new tactical possibilities. Blow through walls to create new lines of sight, collapse structures to cut off enemy advances, or create debris fields to slow down armored units. The environment is as much a weapon as your arsenal, providing endless opportunities for strategic maneuvers.

Unleash Your Creativity: Mech and Vehicle Customization

Take full control of your battlefield strategy by customizing your mechs and select vehicles with an extensive loadout system. Equip your units with a vast arsenal of weapons from devastating cannons to precision-guided missiles each tailored to your preferred combat style.

Go beyond firepower with advanced module customization. Boost your tactical edge by installing modules like enhanced radar systems, drone controllers, night vision, and targeting enhancers. Each module adds unique abilities, allowing you to adapt to every mission's challenges.

With near-limitless combinations, you can fine-tune your war machines to dominate the battlefield. Will you create an unstoppable tank or a high-tech reconnaissance marvel? The choice is yours!

Are you ready to obliterate your enemies, harness the power of destruction, and claim victory?

content_descriptors.notes:
"Crimson Incursion" contains mature themes and depictions that players should be aware of:

Violence and War Themes: The game prominently features intense combat, with depictions of war including frequent scenes of violence. Players will encounter blood and realistic damage effects during gameplay.

Dark Humor and Satire: The game incorporates a tongue-in-cheek approach to its narrative, including the presence of a "war crimes score." While this is intended as satirical commentary and not to be taken seriously, it may not be suitable for all audiences.

Ethical Dilemmas: The storyline occasionally challenges players with decisions that touch on morally sensitive topics, adding depth to the gameplay but potentially evoking discomfort for some.

Players sensitive to these themes are encouraged to approach the game with awareness of its satirical and fictional nature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770/AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection is needed to play and host Co-op games. Internet Connection is NOT Required for Single player once the game is downloaded.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K/AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/AMD RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection is needed to play and host Co-op games. Internet Connection is NOT Required for Single player once the game is downloaded.

short_description: Crimson Incursion thrusts you into the heart of a futuristic battlefield on a distant colony. Command a diverse array of war platforms and unleash your innate prowess to dominate your foes. Inspired by the iconic mech-based games of the early '90s and 2000s.
